Intro.Title: I'm a freelance front-end developer from Berlin who creates digital experiences that everyone likes to use.
Intro.Text: My passion for good design, technology, and innovation come together in all my projects, which I like to accompany from the first idea to release. I'm focused on the development of responsive user interfaces with React and I'm interested in JavaScript, Web Technologies, User Experience, Accessibility, Clean Code, and the Universe. And everything in between.

Technologies.Title: Technologies
Technologies.Text: Using a combination of cutting-edge technologies and reliable open-source software I build user-focused, performant apps and websites for smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

ClientsPartners.Title: Clients & Partners
ClientsPartners.Text: In recent years, I had the honor of working with great teams on a wide range of projects for the best clients in the world, from engaging touch interfaces to complex front-end applications.
